articles.title: Inflation Data Reignites Tariff Fears
articles.description: Recent inflation data shows a rise in the Consumer Price Index (CPI) by 0.3% in June, leading to concerns that President Trump's new tariffs could negatively impact the economy.

articles.title: Trump Announces Deal To End Republican Revolt
articles.description: President Donald Trump has reached an agreement with House Republicans to resolve a standoff that had halted legislative progress on cryptocurrency bills and Pentagon funding.

articles.title: Measles, Rubella And Polio: Diseases That Could Spike With Declining US Vaccine Rates
articles.description: Declining vaccination rates among children in the U.S. raise concerns about potential outbreaks of diseases like measles, rubella, and polio, which were previously under control.
